LABEL.NAME: Label click calls function in annotations XML file
LABEL.URLTARGET: alert(%27Hello from function in annotations XML file!%27);
LABEL.CAPTION: Label click calls function in annotations XML file
LABEL.COMMENT: This is an example comment! Comments are a simple way to add notes about a label.
LABEL.TOOLTIP: Click hotspot to see function execute.

LABEL.NAME: Label click calls function in page
LABEL.CAPTION: Label click calls function in page
LABEL.COMMENT: This comment is somewhat long. Comments can hold a virtually unlimited number of characters (spaces included).
LABEL.TOOLTIP: Click hotspot to see function execute

LABEL.NAME: Label click calls zoomAndPanToView function in Viewer
LABEL.CAPTION: Label click calls zoomAndPanToView function in Viewer
LABEL.COMMENT: A vertical scrollbar automatically appears when a comment requires more lines than fit in the comment area - as is the case with this comment which is not verbose and yet is longer than will fit in the text area without a need to scroll to display the latter part of the comment.
LABEL.TOOLTIP: Click hotspot to see function execute

LABEL.NAME: Label click passes parameters to function in Viewer
LABEL.CAPTION: This caption is overridden by the HTLM caption below

LABELS.LABEL:
COMMENT="Comments can contain carriage returns - new lines created with the Return key - like this... %0D%0A or this %0D%0A or this %0D%0A ...very useful." TOOLTIP="Click hotspot to see function execute" Label click passes,
parameters to function in
Viewer

LABEL.CAPTION: Label click calls setImage function in Viewer
LABEL.TOOLTIP: Click hotspot to see function execute

LABEL.NAME: Hotspot click calls function in page to create DIV in display
LABEL.CAPTION: Hotspot click calls function in page to create DIV in display
LABEL.COMMENT: This is one final example comment.
LABEL.TOOLTIP: Click hotspot to see function execute
